channel.title: Announcement on RedBlackTech
channel.description: Recent content in Announcement on RedBlackTech

item.title: The Channel
item.description: We have a YouTube channel! The idea behind the channel is to analyze video games through the lens of computer science, as well as to provide intuitive explanations for apparently difficult topics. When we say computer science, we mean it! we have covered everything from using object oriented design for FIFA’s virtual ref to mini-lectures on big data architecture. Subscribe at https://youtube.com/@_rbt, and stay tuned for more!
